channel.title: CVE Feed for WPWeb -- WooCommerce PDF Vouchers
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPWeb -- WooCommerce PDF Vouchers

item.title: CVE-2024-39651|2024-08-13T10:49:07.588Z -- wpweb -- woocommerce%20pdf%20vouchers
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in WPWeb WooCommerce PDF Vouchers allows File Manipulation.This issue affects WooCommerce PDF Vouchers: from n/a before 4.9.5.
